    Exploring Material Deepwater Plays

    /operations/exploration
    Hess Announces Oil Discovery Offshore Guyana at Mako-1
    #
    #

    Hess announced another oil discovery on the Stabroek Block offshore Guyana at the Mako-1 well southeast of the Liza Field. The discovery adds to the current gross recoverable resource estimate of more than 6 billion barrels of oil equivalent.

     


    #
    https://www.hess.com/newsroom/news-article/2019-12-23-hess-announces-oil-discovery-offshore-guyana-at-mako-1

    A Leader in Deepwater Drilling and Project Delivery
    Maximizing value through production and development excellence
    /operations/offshore
    Hess Announces First Production from the Liza Field, Offshore Guyana

    #

    #

    Hess today announced startup of production from the Liza Field offshore Guyana, less than five years after the first discovery of hydrocarbons and well ahead of the industry average for deepwater developments.

    #
    https://www.hess.com/newsroom/news-article/2019-12-21-hess-announces-first-production-from-the-liza-field-offshore-guyana

    Developing New Energy Sources
    Through shale oil and gas production
    /operations/onshore
    Hess Positioned to Capture Significant Value Uplift in the Bakken
    #
    #

    Hess is a leading producer with premier acreage and an advantaged infrastructure position in the core of North Dakota’s Bakken shale formation. Our inventory of high return drilling locations and record of asset optimization, cost reduction and value creation position Hess to deliver significant growth in free cash flow and production.

    #
    https://edge.media-server.com/m6/p/v8788axa/clip_start_position/7015
